text: Young Billy Young is a 1969 American western movie directed by Burt Kennedy and based on the novel by Heck Allen. It stars Robert Mitchum, Angie Dickinson, Robert Walker, David Carradine, Jack Kelly, Paul Fix, Deana Martin and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1969 movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Burt Kennedy
title: Young Billy Young
